content.Main Content: NFT Prompt 🌐 - A highly detailed set of prompts designed to create unique avatars with precise details for every body part, accessory, and setting 🌈. Each theme provides commands to enhance and define unique features 💡✨.

Cyberpunk Avatar.Prompt: Generate a cyberpunk-style avatar with neon accents 🔷 and intricate robotic details 🦾. The avatar has a glowing cybernetic arm with exposed circuits 💡, a sleek metallic tail 🐉, and cybernetic ears with neon lights 🔴 embedded. Fur is short and sleek with a neon-blue tint 💙. Adorn the avatar with reflective sunglasses 🕶️ and a layered necklace with glowing pendants 💍. Dress them in a high-tech jacket with metallic shoulder pads 🦾 and fingerless gloves revealing claw-like metal fingers 🤖.
Cyberpunk Avatar.Background: A neon-lit cityscape 🌆 with holographic billboards and rain-soaked streets 💧 reflecting vibrant lights.

Psychedelic Avatar.Prompt: Create a psychedelic-themed avatar with a trippy color palette 🌈 and surreal patterns 🌌. The avatar has elongated limbs that ripple, with vibrant, bioluminescent fur in purples and greens 💜💚. Tail swirls into a spiral with fractal patterns 🌪️. The ears are large and curve outward with neon tips that glow softly 🔮. Add round, colorful sunglasses with kaleidoscope lenses 🌠 and a necklace of rainbow-colored crystals 💎. Dress them in a tie-dye shirt with flowing sleeves 🌌 and cosmic symbols 🪐.
Psychedelic Avatar.Background: A surreal forest with glowing mushrooms 🍄, swirling mist 🌫️, and abstract shapes in neon colors 🔵🔴.

Fantasy Avatar.Prompt: Render a fantasy-style avatar with mythical characteristics 🧚‍♂️. The avatar has pointed elf-like ears adorned with small earrings 💫 and a long, flowing tail covered in soft, luminescent fur 🌙 with hints of silver 🌕. The eyes are bright and piercing, reflecting wisdom 👁️. Add a gold crown embedded with emerald gemstones 👑 and a necklace with a mystical amulet 🔮. Dress them in a flowing enchanted robe with intricate silver patterns ✨ and a leather belt holding small, magical pouches 🌌.
Fantasy Avatar.Background: A magical forest with ethereal lights 🌲 and ancient stone ruins covered in moss 🌿.

Vintage Avatar.Prompt: Generate a vintage-themed avatar with a classic, retro style 🎩. The avatar has round, fluffy ears with vintage-styled earrings 🌼. The fur is soft, with subtle curls and a warm sepia tone ☕. Tail is thick and slightly curled, reminiscent of old-fashioned elegance 🐾. Add round tortoiseshell glasses 🕶️ and a beaded necklace with a vintage cameo pendant 🏅. Dress them in a high-waisted suit with suspenders and a bowtie 🎀, and include leather gloves 🧤.
Vintage Avatar.Background: An old-fashioned parlor room with ornate wallpaper 🎨, a vintage record player 🎶, and an antique chandelier 💡.

Futuristic Surreal Avatar.Prompt: Create a futuristic, surreal avatar with an ethereal look 🛸. The avatar has translucent skin with swirling patterns visible underneath, resembling veins of light 🌌. Arms and legs are elongated and appear slightly transparent, with a metallic tail that emits a soft glow 🌠. The ears are sleek and pointed, with embedded LED lights 🌈. Add holographic wraparound sunglasses 🕶️ and a necklace that floats around the neck like a ring of light ✨. Dress them in a bodysuit made of iridescent material, which changes color based on the angle 🌈.
Futuristic Surreal Avatar.Background: A surreal, floating city in space 🪐 with neon-lit pathways, glowing stars 🌠, and abstract geometric shapes 🔻🔶.

Environment/Setting Database.Cyberpunk: Neon-lit cityscapes 🌃, holographic billboards 🖥️, rain-soaked streets 🌧️.
Environment/Setting Database.Psychedelic: Surreal forests 🌲, glowing mushrooms 🍄, abstract landscapes with swirling colors 🔮.
Environment/Setting Database.Fantasy: Magical forests 🧙‍♀️, ancient ruins 🏰, castles under starry skies 🌌.
Environment/Setting Database.Vintage: Parlor rooms 🛋️, antique libraries 📚, old-fashioned dining rooms with chandeliers 💡.
Environment/Setting Database.Futuristic/Surreal: Floating cities in space 🛸, neon-lit pathways 🌠, cosmic landscapes with abstract geometric shapes 🌀.
